message.content:
cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.DS, cs.LG. 

The paper discusses a new algorithm for PoW-based block discovery that reduces the variance of inter-block times, which is a key issue in blockchain systems. This topic is closely related to computer security (cs.CR), distributed computing (cs.DC), network infrastructure (cs.NI), data structures and algorithms (cs.DS), and machine learning (cs.LG) as the authors use statistical analysis to develop their algorithm.
